name: taxbridge
description: TaxBridge - Sistema de Gesti√≥n Tributaria (Frontend + Backend)

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend/taxbridge-frontend
scripts.prestart: echo =============================== && echo   TaxBridge: Dev Environment   && echo =============================== && echo Iniciando Backend y Frontend...
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c magenta,cyan "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && echo [BACKEND] Iniciando servidor de desarrollo... && npm run dev
scripts.start:frontend: cd frontend/taxbridge-frontend && echo [FRONTEND] Iniciando Angular dev server... && npm start
